synopsis.native: Elle est droite, sérieuse et honnête. Il est lâche, fourbe et sans scrupules. Elle le déteste. Il la méprise. Mais en faisant de lui un héros d'opérette, elle est devenue, malgré elle, responsable d'une imposture qui va très vite la dépasser…
synopsis.english: She's straighforward, serious, and honest. He's a coward, crafty, and unscrupulous. She detests him. He despises her. But by making him a hero of an operetta, she has become, despite herself, responsible for a fraud that will quickly overtake her.
